    Wave - Class in sk.stuba.fiit.waves
    Represents a wave of spawners in the game.

    Constructs a new wave with the specified parameters.
    WaveCollection - Class in sk.stuba.fiit
    A specialized TreeMap that manages a collection of Wave objects, using weighted rarity-based keys to facilitate probabilistic selection.

    weapon - Variable in class sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory
     
    Weapon - Class in sk.stuba.fiit
    Represents a weapon in the game that can shoot projectiles using a ProjectileFactory.
    Weapon(String, String, Texture, ProjectileFactory) - Constructor for class sk.stuba.fiit.Weapon
    Constructs a new Weapon with the specified name, description, texture, and projectile factory.
    weaponFactory - Variable in class sk.stuba.fiit.factories.spawnerfactories.SpawnerFactory
    The factory used to create weapons for the spawner.
    WeaponFactory - Class in sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories
    Abstract factory class for creating instances of Weapon.
    WeaponFactory() - Constructor for class sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory

    WeaponFactory(float, Vector2) - Constructor for class sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory
    Constructor to initialize the weapon factory with specific radius and position of the attacker.
